text:
Julia and I are speechless. You've definitely gone up a notch in terms of prestige. We truly think your work is amazing.
cheers Juliette

Searching once more for a chapter of the past 'Chelson Wells' I suddenly came across the familiar masks in unfamiliar photos! Then I saw the rest of the sculptures - I'm hugely impressed and it confirms that you weren't only capable of creating something beautiful musically.

Beautiful work... well thought out, nicely finished, just as I know you! And as you know, I'm well aware of all the things you're capable of, but this art form is new to me... Impressive!
Warm regards to you and your family.
Max

Wow, especially balance is amazing, I've never seen anything like it before these art pieces don't only contain a story but are also masterfully crafted from beautiful wood
I happened to come across your site while I was googling images
cheers, Hendrike
